SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, decode(trunc(sysdate), trunc(b.regdate), to_char(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS savePath, decode(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || 's_' || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS s_savepath, COUNT(r.rno) AS replycount FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN b_img a ON b.bno = a.bno LEFT JOIN reply r ON b.bno = r.bno WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname, a.filetype, a.uploadpath, a.uuid, a.filename ORDER BY b.bno DESC
